docs.title: About Me
docs.text: I'm Hu Chenkai, now a junior at Zhejiang University, majoring in Computer Science. I'm currently on my research internship at CAD&CG State Key Lab supervised by Prof. Zhaopeng Cui. My research interests include LMM/AIGC/CV/VR/XR... The SRTP project on metropolitan simulation UE5 models that I'm leading is making steady progress.
